metadata.title: CVE-2021-30535 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Double free in ICU in Google Chrome prior to 91.0.4472.77 allowed a remoteattacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-30535` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libicu66 - 66.1-2ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: icu package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '66.1-2ubuntu2.1').
